text: {| |} The HeliWhale Afalina is an ultra-light, coaxial two-seat multipurpose helicopter. The name Afalina comes from the Russian word for "bottlenose dolphin", named for the helicopter's resemblance to the marine mammal. == Cost == According to the manufacturer, the estimated price of the Afalina is $120,000, making it the cheapest light helicopter available. == Specification== ==References== ==External links== * HeliWhale Company web site Category:2010s helicopters
title: HeliWhale Afalina
